Address.label: Address
Address.value: 26, BOULEVARD ROYAL,4TH FLOOR, LUXEMBOURG, L-2449, Luxembourg

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Tenaris is one of the largest global producers of oil country tubular goods, which are used primarily in the construction of oil and gas wells. The company's production facilities are located primarily in the U.S., Argentina, Mexico, and Italy. Tenaris' premium OCTG products are among the most trusted by oil companies for use in the most challenging applications, including deep-water offshore as well as horizontal shale wells.
